General.Name: Zhejiang Tiancheng Control Co
General.Description: Zhejiang Tiancheng Controls Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, sale, and service of automobile seats in China and internationally. Its products include construction machinery, commercial vehicle, passenger car, aircraft, and child safety seats; Frame and mechanism products; foam and seat covers; and light weight products. The company was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Tiantai, China.

2.Name: Mr. Jin Ming  Tian
2.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang. and Sec. of the Board
